title: Delicious pumpkin cheesecake
ingredients: ['750g (1 1/2 lb) pumpkin', 'Base', '50g (2 oz) butter, softened', '65 g (2 1/2 oz) sugar', '1 egg', '150g (5 oz) flour', 'Filling', '450g (1 lb) cream cheese, at room temperature', '175g (6 oz) castor sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon grated nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', 'Decoration', '150 ml (1/4 pt) double cream, whipped', 'small marzipan fruits']
